                                                            package iceriver.boot;

import iceriver.boot.bean.Pet;
import iceriver.boot.bean.User;
import iceriver.boot.config.MyConfig;
import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;
import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;
import org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext;

/**
 * @author: INFINITY https://developer.aliyun.com/profile/sagwrxp2ua66w
 * @date: 2022/8/3 20:10
 */
//@SpringBootApplication(scanBasePackages = "iceriver.boot")
@SpringBootApplication
public class MainApplication {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //1ã€è¿”å›IOCå®¹å™¨
        ConfigurableApplicationContext run = SpringApplication.run(MainApplication.class, args);
        //2ã€æŸ¥çœ‹å®¹å™¨é‡Œé¢çš„ç»„ä»¶
        String[] names = run.getBeanDefinitionNames();
        for (String name : names) {
            System.out.println(name);
        }
        //3ã€ä»å®¹å™¨è·å–ç»„ä»¶
        Pet tom01 = run.getBean("tom", Pet.class);
        Pet tom02 = run.getBean("tom", Pet.class);
        System.out.println(tom01 == tom02);//true

        MyConfig bean = run.getBean(MyConfig.class);
        //System.out.println(bean);//iceriver.boot.config.MyConfig$$EnhancerBySpringCGLIB$$2bce5da6@585ac855
        User user = bean.user01();
        User user1 = bean.user01();
        System.out.println(user == user1);//true
    }
}

                                                            # 2.1.2 @Bean

                                                            1. ç»™å®¹å™¨ä¸­æ·»åŠ ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œç”¨åœ¨æ–¹æ³•å‰ï¼Œæ–¹æ³•åä¸ºç»„ä»¶idï¼Œè¿”å›ç±»å‹ä¸ºç»„ä»¶ç±»å‹ï¼Œè¿”å›å€¼ä¸ºç»„ä»¶åœ¨å®¹å™¨ä¸­çš„å®ä¾‹ã€‚
                                                              • å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹çš„æ–¹å¼@Bean("tom")ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰åç§°ï¼ˆä¸ä»¥æ–¹æ³•åä½œä¸ºç»„ä»¶åï¼‰
                                                            2. é€šè¿‡MainApplication.javaä¸»ç¨‹åºä»å®¹å™¨è·å–ç»„ä»¶ï¼š

                                                            package iceriver.boot.config;

import iceriver.boot.bean.Pet;
import iceriver.boot.bean.User;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;

/**
 * @author: INFINITY https://developer.aliyun.com/profile/sagwrxp2ua66w
 * @date: 2022/8/3 23:00
 */
@Configuration
public class MyConfig {
    @Bean
    public User user01(){
        return new User("å¼ ä¸‰", 18);
    }
    @Bean("tom")
    public Pet tomPet(){
        return new Pet("tom01");
    }
}

                                                            package iceriver.boot;

import iceriver.boot.bean.Pet;
import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;
import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;
import org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext;

/**
 * @author: INFINITY https://developer.aliyun.com/profile/sagwrxp2ua66w
 * @date: 2022/8/3 20:10
 */
//@SpringBootApplication(scanBasePackages = "iceriver.boot")
@SpringBootApplication
public class MainApplication {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //1ã€è¿”å›IOCå®¹å™¨
        ConfigurableApplicationContext run = SpringApplication.run(MainApplication.class, args);
        //2ã€æŸ¥çœ‹å®¹å™¨é‡Œé¢çš„ç»„ä»¶
        String[] names = run.getBeanDefinitionNames();
        for (String name : names) {
            System.out.println(name);
        }
        //3ã€ä»å®¹å™¨è·å–ç»„ä»¶
        Pet tom01 = run.getBean("tom", Pet.class);
        Pet tom02 = run.getBean("tom", Pet.class);
        System.out.println(tom01 == tom02);//true
    }
}
                                                            1. é€šè¿‡MainApplication.javaä¸»ç¨‹åºä»å®¹å™¨è·å–é…ç½®ç±»ç»„ä»¶ï¼š

                                                            package iceriver.boot;

import iceriver.boot.config.MyConfig;
import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;
import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;
import org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext;

/**
 * @author: INFINITY https://developer.aliyun.com/profile/sagwrxp2ua66w
 * @date: 2022/8/3 20:10
 */
//@SpringBootApplication(scanBasePackages = "iceriver.boot")
@SpringBootApplication
public class MainApplication {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //1ã€è¿”å›IOCå®¹å™¨
        ConfigurableApplicationContext run = SpringApplication.run(MainApplication.class, args);
        //2ã€æŸ¥çœ‹å®¹å™¨é‡Œé¢çš„ç»„ä»¶
        String[] names = run.getBeanDefinitionNames();
        for (String name : names) {
            System.out.println(name);
        }
        //3ã€ä»å®¹å™¨è·å–ç»„ä»¶ï¼ˆé…ç½®ç±»ï¼‰
        System.out.println(run.getBean(MyConfig.class));//iceriver.boot.config.MyConfig$$EnhancerBySpringCGLIB$$2bce5da6@585ac855
    }
}

                                                            ã€å‚è§Spring5 2.3.102.Spring5open in new windowã€‘

                                                            # 2.3 ç¬¬ä¸‰ç»„ï¼š@ComponentScan

                                                            # 2.4 ç¬¬å››ç»„ï¼š@Import

                                                            1. å¯ä»¥ç”¨åœ¨ä»»ä½•ç»„ä»¶ä¸Šï¼Œé…åˆä»»ä½•ç»„ä»¶æ³¨è§£ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚
